remarks: An alternative definition of proper substitution ~ df-sb .  Similar to ~ dfsb7a but does not require that ` ph ` and ` z ` be distinct. Similar to ~ sb7f in that it involves a dummy variable ` z ` , but expressed in terms of ` A. ` rather than ` E. ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 5-Feb-2018.)
statement:
sb7af.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
sb7af $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> A. z ( z = y -> A. x ( x = z -> ph ) ) ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
